ovdesc.p: The Standing Order Application allows the User to create DIARY type Standing Order instructions. The program STO.PAYMENTS will then automatically update the internal file STO.DIARY whenever the frequency date of the Diary standing order has been reached. In this file, the System will always keep track of:
2 - The ordering customer i.e. the customer of the account on which the diary instruction has been placed.

As and when required, the User can request an on-line Print or display on this file to verify any Diary instructions where it is expected that some action should be taken. This can be done by means of the standard T24 Functions P, L and S. (List and See.)
The List function (L) will provide Users with all the Diary instructions where the frequency date has been reached.
